source.source_name: UN SDG Goal 14: Life Below Water
source.description: Sustainable Development Goal 14 (Life Below Water) indicators from UN Statistics Division.

source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Life Below Water
goal.full_title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
goal.description: Goal 14 focuses on conserving and sustainably using the oceans, seas and marine resources. It addresses marine pollution, ocean acidification, overfishing, marine protected areas, and the sustainable use of marine resources by small island developing states and least developed countries.

targets.text: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds
By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems
Minimize and address the impacts of ocean acidification
By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal fishing and destructive fishing practices
By 2020, conserve at least 10 per cent of coastal and marine areas
By 2020, prohibit certain forms of fisheries subsidies which contribute to overcapacity and overfishing
By 2030, increase the economic benefits to small island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources

key_indicators: ER_REG_UNFCIM - Implementation of instruments to combat illegal fishing

metrics.ind_14_1_1: Beach litter originating from national land-based sources that ends in the beach (Tonnes)
metrics.ind_14_2_1: Number of countries using ecosystem-based approaches to managing marine areas (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
metrics.ind_14_3_1: Average marine acidity (pH) measured at agreed suite of representative sampling stations
metrics.ind_14_4_1: Proportion of fish stocks within biologically sustainable levels (not overexploited) (%)
metrics.ind_14_5_1: Average proportion of Marine Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
metrics.ind_14_6_1: Progress by countries in the degree of implementation of international instruments aiming to combat illegal, unreported
metrics.ind_14_7_1: Sustainable fisheries as a proportion of GDP
metrics.ind_14_a_1: National ocean science expenditure as a share of total research and development funding (%)
metrics.ind_14_b_1: Degree of application of a legal/regulatory/policy/institutional framework which recognizes and protects access rights f
metrics.ind_14_c_1: Score for the ratification of and accession to UNCLOS and its two implementing agreements (%)
